Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires January 31, 2019.
